SEARCH
Package Model

Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
Model.Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object

The Hotel class represents a hotel entity with rooms and reservations. It manages rooms, reservations, and provides various operations related to rooms and reservations within the hotel.

Version:
4.4
Author:
Jusper Angelo Cesar

  • Constructor Details

    • Hotel

      Hotel(String name, double price, int standard, int deluxe, int executive, String hotelRoomPrefix)
      Constructs a new Hotel object with the specified name, room prices, room counts for each type, and hotel room prefix.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the hotel.
      price - The base price for the rooms in the hotel.
      standard - The number of standard rooms to initialize.
      deluxe - The number of deluxe rooms to initialize.
      executive - The number of executive rooms to initialize.
      hotelRoomPrefix - The prefix for generating room IDs.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the total number of rooms (standard + deluxe + executive) is zero, less than zero, or exceeds the maximum allowed number of rooms.

  • Method Details

    • sortRoomsByRoomNumber

      private void sortRoomsByRoomNumber()
      Sorts rooms by the room number

    • extractRoomNumber

      private int extractRoomNumber(String roomId)
      Extracts the room number from the room name
      Parameters:
      roomId - the room name to extract from
      Returns:
      roomNumber

    • roomsInitializer

      private void roomsInitializer(int standard, int deluxe, int executive)
      Initializes rooms in the hotel with the specified numbers for each room type.
      Parameters:
      standard - The number of standard rooms to initialize.
      deluxe - The number of deluxe rooms to initialize.
      executive - The number of executive rooms to initialize. This method creates and adds rooms to the hotel's list of rooms, with unique room IDs based on the existing number of rooms and the hotel room prefix.

    • getNextRoomId

      private String getNextRoomId()
      Generates the next available room ID based on existing rooms.
      Returns:
      The next available room ID.

    • addReservation

      public void addReservation(String guestName, String roomType, int checkIn, int checkOut, String discount)
      Adds a reservation to the hotel for the specified guest, room type, and dates.
      Parameters:
      guestName - The name of the guest making the reservation.
      roomType - The type of room to be reserved (e.g., "Standard", "Deluxe", "Executive").
      checkIn - The check-in date (as an integer, typically representing the day of the month).
      checkOut - The check-out date (as an integer, typically representing the day of the month).
      discount - The discount code to apply to the reservation, if any.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there are no available rooms of the specified type for the given dates.

    • removeReservation

      public void removeReservation(String reservationID)
      Removes a reservation from the hotel, including its associated room and reservation list.
      Parameters:
      reservationID - The reservation to remove.

    • removableRooms

      public int removableRooms()
      Counts and returns the number of rooms in the hotel that can be removed (have no reservations).
      Returns:
      The number of removable rooms.

    • checkReservationID

      public boolean checkReservationID(String reservationID)
      Checks if a reservation ID exists in the hotel's reservations.
      Parameters:
      reservationID - The reservation ID to check.
      Returns:
      true if the reservation ID exists, otherwise false.

    • findAvailableRoom

      private Room findAvailableRoom(int checkInDay, int checkOutDay, String roomType)
      Finds an available room in the hotel for a specified check-in and check-out day.
      Parameters:
      checkInDay - The check-in day.
      checkOutDay - The check-out day.
      roomType - the room type of available room to find
      Returns:
      The available room object if found, otherwise null.

    • findRoom

      private Room findRoom(String roomToFind)

      Parameters:
      roomToFind - The room ID to find.
      Returns:
      The room object if found, otherwise null.

      Parameters:
      reservationID - The reservation ID to find.
      Returns:

    • getNoOfAvailableRooms

      public int[] getNoOfAvailableRooms(int day)
      Retrieves the number of available rooms in the hotel on a specified day.
      Parameters:
      day - The day to check availability.
      Returns:
      The number of available rooms in an array, from standard to executive 0 to 2.
